name: LymeDiseaseTestsForBorreliaAfzeliiGariniiIgGAntibodyByImmunoassay
title: Lyme Disease (Tests for Borrelia afzelii/garinii IgG Antibody by Immunoassay
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia afzelii/garinii IgG Antibody by Immunoassay),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Borrelia afzelii/garinii IgG; Immunoassay including EIA and IFA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
